description:
Thanks to Hisense for making this possible! Check out the Hisense C2 Ultra projector at https://lmg.gg/hisenseusa
Buy in Canada: https://lmg.gg/hisenseca
Buy in Canada on Amazon: https://geni.us/R3Bm
Buy in Mexico: https://lmg.gg/hisensemx
Buy in Mexico on Amazon: https://geni.us/Z2n1jn

Hisense YouTube: @HisenseInternational 

Yvonne has asked Linus to build a Movie theater for the Pool! And thanks to Hisense we are able to add the C2 Ultra projector, a 100” theater screen, and even some pool floaties to embrace the chaos.

Discuss on the forum: https://linustechtips.com/topic/1586980-my-wife-insisted-i-do-this-for-her/

► GET OUR MERCH: https://lttstore.com
